bacci.giovanni.bio.sequencing

Class FastaFileDereplicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • bacci.giovanni.bio.sequencing.FastaFileDereplicator

  • public class FastaFileDereplicator
extends Object
    Main class that delete redundant sequences from one or multiple sequences files. The ids of each sequence will be collected in a separate file and a frequency table will be written using the file names as tags.
    Author:
    Giovanni Bacci

    • Constructor Summary

      This constructor takes two parameters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FastaFileDereplicator

        public FastaFileDereplicator(Path input,
                     Path output)
        This constructor takes two parameters. If the input path is a directory all the files contained in it will be scanned for redundancy, otherwise only the selected file will be scanned. If the output path is a directory 3 files will be generated in it called:
        1) sequences.fasta (the sequences file)
        2) ids.txt (the ids collection file)
        3) frequency.csv (the frequency table)
        Otherwise, if the output path is a file its name will be used as prefix for the names of the 3 files described above; a '_' character will be used to separate the prefix from the name of the file.
        Parameters:
        input - the input path
        output - the output path

    • Method Detail

      • dereplicate

        public void dereplicate()
                 throws IOException
        Method that starts the redundancy control.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an IO Error occurs.
